Desain Kereta Cepat Gadis 13 Tahun Ini Mungkin Ungguli Elon Musk
06 Nov 2019, 05:45 by Elmy Tasya Khairally


Foto: Caroline Crouchley (3M Young Scientist Challenge)

New York - Gadis 13 tahun asal New York muncul dengan rancangan desain kereta super cepat yang ekonomis dan ramah lingkungan. Yang menarik, rancangannya mungkin mengungguli Hyperloop-nya Elon Musk.Dikutip dari berbagai sumber, rancangan sistem transportasi itu dimunculkan Caroline Crouchley, seorang ilmuwan muda berumur 13 tahun. Desainnya dianggap inovatif dan lebih efisien, lebih cepat, dan lebih baik dari Hyperloop.Proses kemunculan rancangan ini tak lepas dari peran guru sains di sekolahnya, yang mendorong Crouchley untuk mengikuti 3M Young Scientist Challenge. Kompetisi ini mengundang siswa sekolah menengah di Amerika Serikat untuk mengirimkan video yang menguraikan solusi cerdas dalam masalah sehari-hari.Ide Crouchley meraih predikat runner-up dalam kompetisi ini. Dia membuat tabung pneumatik di sebelah rel kereta yang sudah ada. Nah, saat penelitian itu Crouchley melihat mekanisme kereta Hyperloop dan Maglev.Dengan ide membangun tabung pneumatik di sebelah rel kereta yang telah ada, maka ia yakin bisa membuat perjalanan berkecepatan tinggi lebih murah. Kereta rancangan Crouchley secara teori juga bisa melakukan perjalanan lebih cepat dari kereta AS saat ini.


Foto: (Caroline Crouchley)

"Setelah mendapat inspirasi, saya melakukan banyak penelitian pada desain saya, Hyperloop dan Maglev. Saya meletakkan desain saya di atas kertas, kemudian memasukkannya ke Autodesk Inventor (Program komputer untuk desain 3D)," ungkap Crouchley.Berdasarkan penelitian Crouchley, Maglev adalah desain kereta yang sangat efisien tapi mahal. Sedangkan Hyperloop, yang lebih tradisional, disebutnya punya desain yang memiliki risiko sangat tinggi.Ketika ditanya alasan membuat inovasi ini, Crouchley mengatakan kereta yang lebih efisien bisa mengurangi kendaraan di jalan seperti mobil, truk, dan bis. "Jika kita bisa membuat kereta lebih efisien, kita bisa mengurangi jumlah mobil, truk, dan bus di jalan," katanya.Crouchley mengatakan desain keretanya lebih murah dan efisien dari teknologi yang telah ada. Bahkan kereta bisa lebih ringan dan berjalan cepat. Selain itu, sistem kereta rancangannya pun ramah lingkungan."Desain kereta saya bisa lebih murah dan efisien dari pada teknologi kereta api yang telah ada di luar sana, ini juga lebih aman dari Hyperloop. Desain saya mengandalkan energi terbarukan 100%, menghilangkan kebutuhan untuk mesin diesel atau motor listrik sehingga membuat kereta lebih ringan dan berjalan lebih cepat," tuturnya.Simak Video "Kompor Meledak di Kereta, 74 Penumpang Tewas"[Gambas:Video 20detik](elk/krs)

This 13-year-old girl's fast train design might outperform Elon Musk
Nov 6, 2019, 05:45 by Elmy Tasya Khairally


Photo: Caroline Crouchley (3M Young Scientist Challenge)

New York - A 13-year-old girl from New York came up with an economical and environmentally friendly super-fast train design. Interestingly, the design may outperform Elon Musk's Hyperloop. Quoted from various sources, the design of the transportation system was raised by Caroline Crouchley, a 13-year-old young scientist. The design is considered innovative and more efficient, faster, and better than Hyperloop. The process of emergence of this design cannot be separated from the role of science teachers in his school, which encouraged Crouchley to participate in the 3M Young Scientist Challenge. This competition invites middle school students in the United States to submit videos describing smart solutions to everyday problems. Crouchley's ideas won runners-up in the competition. He made a pneumatic tube next to the existing railroad tracks. Now, during the research, Crouchley looked at the mechanism of the Hyperloop and Maglev trains. With the idea of building a pneumatic tube next to the existing railroad tracks, he was sure he could make high-speed travel cheaper. Crouchley train design in theory can also travel faster than current US trains.


Photo: (Caroline Crouchley)

"After getting inspired, I did a lot of research on my designs, Hyperloop and Maglev. I put my design on paper, then put it into Autodesk Inventor (a computer program for 3D design)," said Crouchley. Based on Crouchley research, Maglev is a train design which is very efficient but expensive. While Hyperloop, which is more traditional, he said has a design that has a very high risk. When asked the reason for making this innovation, Crouchley said a more efficient train could reduce vehicles on the road such as cars, trucks and buses. "If we can make trains more efficient, we can reduce the number of cars, trucks and buses on the road," he said. Crouchley said his train design was cheaper and more efficient than existing technology. Even trains can be lighter and run fast. In addition, the design of the train system is also environmentally friendly. "My train design can be cheaper and more efficient than existing train technology out there, it's also safer than Hyperloop. My design relies on 100% renewable energy, eliminating the need for engines diesel or electric motor so that it makes the train lighter and runs faster, "he said.
